title: Stream: Frank Ocean – Channel Orange
content:
Following a rather hectic past few weeks for Mr Ocean, he last night announced that he’d be bringing forward the iTunes release of his new album; Channel Orange, to tie in with his appearance on Jimmy Fallon.

The BBC Sound of 2012 runner up has already gone some way to cementing his status as a real talent in the R’n’B community, having worked with the likes of Beyonce, Kanye West and Jay-Z. Featuring the previous heard Sweet LIFE, Pyramids and Thinkin’ About You as well as guest slots from John Mayer, Andre 3000 and Earl Sweatshirt, Channel Orange is available to stream in it’s entirety below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
